changeSet.author: Aldik
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO book(name, author, order_date, library_id) VALUES ('Foundation', 'Asimov', null, (select id from library where name = 'Karbysheva')), ('Margarita', 'Bulgakov', null, (select id from library where name = 'Karbysheva')), ('Metel', 'Pushkin', null, (select id from library where name = 'Lenina')), ('Cryptography', 'Asimov', null, (select id from library where name = 'GRSU')), ('Knight', 'Trevor', null, (select id from library where name = 'GRSU')), ('Java', 'Oreilly', null, (select id from library where name = 'Lenina')), ('Warckraft', 'Blizzard', null, (select id from library where name = 'Lenina')), ('Star', 'Alex', null, (select id from library where name = 'Karbysheva')), ('Porche', 'Petrov', null, (select id from library where name = 'GRSU')), ('RS5', 'Audi', null, (select id from library where name = 'Karbysheva'))
